attributes.title: Inspecting the bunker
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to keep with with the toddler, I mean president and his campaign. Disappointed that they asked for my number, I don’t like giving it out to strangers! Also, very bold of them to assume I have friends and have friends that like trump, all to earn points. Very very sad :’(

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: After downloading the app, it was tracking my IP address and go a hold of all my social medias, my home address and my job’s. A week afterwards i kept seeing and getting threatening notes, people outside my house and fancy cars following me everywhere. Almost got kidnapped and they killed my dog who was trying to protect me.

attributes.title: Barely functional
attributes.review: Can’t even log in without giving more personal info than anywhere else.  99% data mining, not trustworthy at all.  Look at all the internet connections your phone makes after getting set up!  Your battery withers.

attributes.title: wow. i didnt think an app could be this bad.
attributes.review: I got this app to support the very epic cool president😎😎😎 but as SOON as i opened the app, a big fat monstrosity of an orange popped up on my screen 😧😧 so naturally i got horrified and to cope with it, i watched some videos of bernie 🤩😼 i DO NOT recommend this app at ALL, it will scare the racism out of you, then trump will have no more supporters 🙀😼😻

attributes.title: Truth Detector!
attributes.review: Great app! Easy to use and look up News I missed without the bias sound bites from Fake News

attributes.title: LITTERED WITH BUGS
attributes.review: I downloaded this this game for a fun pastime but as soon as I downloaded it started glitching like crazy and vibrating and all sorts of stuff my phone then shut down and I tried to reboot it but then i started to hear trump speaking Latin from my phone and he had summoned a demon and it attacked me and stole my pinky finger DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU ENJOY HAVING ALL YOUR FINGERS

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: My phone literally exploded when I downloaded the app. The explosion killed 6 of my family members (even though I only 3🥳)I do not recommend this app at all. It also gave my friend a seizure and sent him to the hospital or 13 years. He soon passed away. Please don’t make the same mistake.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it made me choose my race and when I did it started to delete all my important files and showed lots of pop up ads about landscaping after putting my race as Hispanic and when it hit 4:20 it would send me a plant emoji and a photo of 6ix9ine
